name: VR Traning Demo
description:
Inspired by VR training in the market, I built a VR training game myself. 

The development of this game includes programming for game function/manager scripts in C#,3D modeling, improvements on VRTK toolkit, and more.

This game requires windows OS, steamVR, and HTC VIVE to play.

Github: https://github.com/GaryAtGitHub/VR-DEMO
